rpcfy

Interface JSONify

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GsonJsonify

    public interface JSONify
    Converts an object to and from JSON.

    A default implementation of this is provided by GsonJsonify which uses Gson.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  JSONify.JElement
      Represents a JSON element
      static interface  JSONify.JObject
      Represents a JSON object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JSONify.JElement fromJson(java.lang.String json)
      Converts given JSON string to JSONify.JElement
      <T> T fromJSON(java.lang.String json, java.lang.Class<T> type)
      Convert given json message to object of given type
      <T> T fromJSON(java.lang.String json, java.lang.String parameter, java.lang.Class<T> type)
      Convert given parameter from json message to object of given type
      <T> T fromJSON(java.lang.String json, java.lang.String parameter, java.lang.reflect.Type type)
      Convert given parameter from json message to object of given type
      java.lang.String getJSONElement(java.lang.String json, java.lang.String parameter)
      Returns the json element representing the given parameter from given json
      JSONify.JObject newJson()
      Returns a new JSONify.JObject
      JSONify.JElement toJson(java.lang.Object object)
      Converts given Object to JSONify.JElement
